title: Open Source Client Libraries and Tools
description: OMH revolutionizes the mobile ecosystem with its open-source framework, accessible on GitHub for seamless collaboration and innovation. The mobile client libraries and tools empower developers to seamlessly integrate a wide range of mobile services from various providers into their applications.

title: Unified Codebase: Reaching All Devices, GMS and Non-GMS
description: Unlock the power of a single Android codebase, seamlessly catering to both GMS and Non-GMS devices. Streamline your development process, maximize reach, and deliver consistent user experiences across a diverse range of Android devices.

title: Empowering Third-Party Providers: Extensibility with Plugins
description: The SDKs offer an exceptional extensible capability, empowering third-party providers to develop their own Android library plugins through the implementation of standard interfaces.
